traits: Limited Psionics: You have 4 psionic charges, which refresh when you finish a long rest. At your DM's discretion, you may learn more psionics through adventure and research. The DC for your psionic saving throws equal 8 + your INT mod + your proficiency bonus.
Gemstone Dragon Mindspeak: You can hear the murmurs of gemstone dragon mindspeak within 1 mile.
